trans-unit.source: Represents child controls of containers that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref>.
Controls that support <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> can typically be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.
Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref>.
Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Current%2A>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>.
The cached property values.
The requested property is not in the cache.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Column"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ColumnSpan"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref>.
This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>.
The current property values.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.

The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Row"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.RowSpan"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
